name: Doran's Shield
tooltip:
Doran's Shield

Cost: 450
+80 Health

UNIQUE Passive - Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.

UNIQUE Passive - Recovery: Restores 6 health every 5 seconds.

UNIQUE Passive - Endure: After taking damage from a champion, large monster or epic monster, gain health regeneration equal to 0 - 40 (based on current missing health) health over 8 seconds. Reduced to 66% effectiveness on ranged champions or when triggered by AoE, DoT or proc effects.
